links.title: Mnuchin admits potential trade war with China, stocks tumble amid fears
links.description: WASHINGTON -- Once again, fears about a possible trade war hit Wall Street hard Friday. The Dow fell more than 570 points, or 2.3 percent. "There is the potential of a trade war," said Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin. That prediction sent stocks tumbling.

messages.body: How Intel Might Be Affected If It Loses Apple As A Customer https://benzinga.com/z/11461773 $AAPL $INTC

links.title: How Intel Might Be Affected If It Loses Apple As Customer (NASDAQ:INTC)(NASDAQ:AAPL)
links.description: Intel Corporation (NASDAQ: INTC) stock tanked Monday following a report by Bloomberg that Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL) intends to start producing its own PC chips as soon as 2020. It didn't take long for Wall Street to react to the latest threat to Intel's business.
